name: WPDK
body:
### Welcome to WPDK.

WPDK (WordPress Development Kit) is an awesone Open Source framework to develop in WordPress.

## Requirements

* Wordpress 3.4 or higher (last version is suggest)
* PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
* MySQL version 5.0 or greater

## Get Started

*coming*

## Issue and Bug Tracking

Have a :bug: bug? Please create an issue here on GitHub that conforms with [our guidelines](https://github.com/wpxtreme/wpdk/blob/master/ISSUE-GUIDELINES.md).

https://github.com/wpxtreme/wpdk/issues
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
